query.description: string for search. Only works with pagination
Boolean for whether to use pagination.
Get results 'Before' the marker passed into this parameter. Marker string comes from response
Get results 'After' the marker passed into this parameter. Marker string comes from response
Page size limit. Only available with pagination. If more than the max of 200 is supplied, the limit will be 200

body.raw:
{
    "id": "someAttr",
    "trafficTypeId": "{{traffictype-id}}",
    "displayName": "Some Attribute",
    "description": "This is an attribute updated",
    "dataType": "STRING",
    "isSearchable": true,
    "suggestedValues": ["A", "B"]
}

{
    "displayName": "Some Attribute",
    "description": "This is an attribute Patched",
    "dataType": "STRING",
    "isSearchable": true,
    "suggestedValues": ["A", "B"]
}

[
    {
        "id": "someAttr",
        "organizationId": "{{org-id}}",
        "trafficTypeId": "{{traffictype-id}}",
        "displayName": "Some Attribute",
        "description": "This is an attribute",
        "dataType": "STRING",
        "isSearchable": true,
        "suggestedValues": [
            "A",
            "B"
        ]
    },
    {
        "id": "anotherAttr",
        "organizationId": "{{org-id}}",
        "trafficTypeId": "{{traffictype-id}}",
        "displayName": "Another Attribute",
        "description": "This is also an attribute",
        "dataType": "NUMBER",
        "isSearchable": true,
        "suggestedValues": [
            "0",
            "1"
        ]
    }
]

[{ "key": <string: key>, "values": { <string: attribute_id>: <string: value> }, { <string: attribute_id2>: <string: value2> } },
{ "key": <string: key2>, "values": { <string: attribute_id>: <string: value> }, { <string: attribute_id2>: <string: value2> } }]
